title: Premium Sales Pipeline Tracker
description: A visually stunning, premium sales pipeline tracker built for modern SaaS applications.

generation_hints.data_visualization: Use Recharts for funnel charts (pipeline stages), line charts (revenue trends), and bar charts (quota attainment). Enable interactive tooltips with deal details.
generation_hints.drag_drop: Implement @dnd-kit for drag-and-drop deal cards between stages. Update deal stage and probability on drop. Show visual feedback during drag.
generation_hints.currency_formatting: Format deal values with $ and thousands separators. Use Intl.NumberFormat for locale-specific formatting. Show weighted values in muted color.
generation_hints.real_time_updates: Use React Query with 2-minute refetch for pipeline data. Implement optimistic updates for stage changes. Show live notifications for deal updates.
generation_hints.responsive_design: On mobile, show pipeline stages as accordion. Convert kanban board to vertical list. Use swipe gestures for stage navigation.
generation_hints.filters_sorting: Implement multi-criteria filters (stage, value range, close date, owner). Add sort by value, probability, date. Persist filter state in URL params.
generation_hints.loading_states: Show skeleton cards in each pipeline stage during load. Use shimmer effect on value updates. Display loading spinner for heavy calculations.
